literals.EmptyLogin: Please type your email and password.
literals.IncorrectLogin: Your email or password are wrong. Please try again.
literals.ConnectToInternet: You need to connect to the internet in order to continue.
literals.OnlineModeWarning: You are running the in online mode. Make sure you have a good connection.
literals.DownloadError: Error downloading content. Downloading will be started again automatically in a few seconds...
literals.DeviceUnsupported: You need a different device to run this program.
literals.InactivityWarning: You have not used this application for a while. If you do not click below you will be automatically logged out.
literals.NotAnsweredQuestions: You have missed a question.|You have not answered {count} questions.
literals.IncorrectQuestions: You need to answer all questions correctly.
literals.DirtyExercise: Are you sure? You will lose any work you have done in this exercise.
literals.UnreadExerciseFeedback: This exercise has feedback you haven't read.  Do you want to read it?
literals.ClickAnswersForFeedback: Click on the answers to show feedback.
